dms.model.Movie

Packages that use Movie
Package
Description
dms.dao
Data Access Layer for Movie entities.
dms.gui
Swing-based user interface for the Movie Manager DMS.
dms.service
Service layer coordinating validation, business rules and DAO orchestration.
